title: Jake Auerbach of RM Auctions
description:
Jake Auerbach is a vehicle auctions specialst for RM/Sothebys International Auction House. Recorded just before Pebble Beach Car Week Begins, Jake stops by the studio to discuss some of the more spectacular cars at their Pebble Beach Auctions, including the Ferrari 250 GTO that ended up selling for $44 Million, and the Ford GT40 that brought in nearly $10 Million. We also discuss the collector market at the more affordable range, the best things to see and do in Pebble Beach for car week, and Matt gives a tour of the insane, $250M Bruce Mackowski house in Bel Air, featuring a bowling alley, candy store, a pre-curated car collection, and a replica of the Airwolf helicopter. 

This podcast is available as a video! Get it at: 

https://youtu.be/mTpmI7aAE6A

Follow Jake's Instagram at: https://www.instagram.com/je_auerbach/
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
